cast.overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch, Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.
cast.title: The Godfather

details.biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Richard Salvatore Castellano  (September 4, 1933 – December 10, 1988) was an American actor who is best remembered for his role as Peter Clemenza in The Godfather.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Richard S. Castellano, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia
details.name: Richard S. Castellano
details.place_of_birth: The Bronx, New York City, New York, USA
